page.title: 02PEOPLE IN SALTCOATS
page.content: Most people in SALTCOATS are white-skinned{Scots.}Most of them belong to families that have for generations lived in the Saltcoats area.{"Outsiders"}include many from {GLASGOW,}moved here in the early '50's as{"overspill"}during slum clearance. There are about 40{Indians/Pakistanis and almost 50{Chinese.}All of these people work in restaurants or small shops. The population is ageing and this has created a demand for special housing for old people (see p.4). It has also led to a reduction in numbers of pupils in the local schools.
